pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Flytekit dbt pluginFlytekit plugin for performing DBT tasks. Currently it supports `dbt run` , `dbt test`, `dbt source freshness` tasks.To install the plugin, run the following command:```bashpip install flytekitplugins-dbt```_Example coming soon!_## Contributors- [Gojek](https://www.gojek.io/)
